challengeName: $200 National Solar Tour Modal Window JSON Files and Multi Upload Updates (AngularJS/HTML/CSS/JS)
detailedRequirements:
Welcome to $200 National Solar Tour Modal Window JSON Files and Multi Upload Updates (AngularJSHTML/CSS/JS)
For this F2F, we need your help of these following tasks:
- Update fields inside modal window to load from JSON files instead of HTML hardcode, and
- Update upload field to support multiple file

Read more details information below.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
IMPORTANT
This F2F is subjective - so the first solution that the client likes and fulfills the required updates will win. We will consider all submissions until a the winner is declared.

Attachment Files
prototype.zip - Existing UI Prototype as Base Updates

Web Browsers Requirements
- Safari latest version
- Firefox latest version
- Chrome latest version
- Safari Browsers on iPad Standard/Retina (Landscape and Portrait Orientation)
- Safari Browsers on iPhone Standard/Retina (Landscape and Portrait Orientation)

Important!
- FYI: Existing prototype built using AngularJS frameworks.
- Your UI Prototype submission need remain support responsive layout.  
- Let us know if you face any problem related responsive layout on required platforms
- Follow existing code and layout implementation

Page Requirements:

1. Modal Window JSON Files
page need updated are:
- Map My Tour > Filter Site > Filter Your Site Modal Window
- Sponsor a Tour > Filter Site > Filter Your Site Modal Window

Detail tasks
- Remove dotted pagination in the bottom area of modal window
- We need update all fields inside the modal to load from JSON file instead hardcoded in HTML code
- You need create proper structure in JSON file for difference sections like “type”, “date and times” and “technology”
- When we add or remove data from JSON files, each form field need present same margin/spacing.
- Modal window width need remain same, if for example we add new checkboxes on “type sections”, new checkbox need move down if there’s no space
- Modal Window height need automatically expand when fill with more OR less fields.

2. Multi Upload Updates
page need updated is:
- Host My Tour on a Tour > I want to help on the tour > Tour Hosting Form Modal Window
- We need support multiple file upload when user click the “camera” icons
- Use this plugin: https://github.com/danialfarid/ng-file-upload
- Use as much feature as possible from that plugin
- After user select multiple images, need show list of upload progress below the upload field
- As possible match plugin upload style to follow existing prototype design theme
 

F2F GUIDELINES
We will review submissions as they are submitted
We will review ALL submissions until we declare a winner based on
1) Task Requirements
2) Client is happy with how it looks/works
3) Time the solution was submitted

Let us know if you have any questions.

Thank you
